story.title: A mystery dinosaur in the basement
story.short_title: A mystery dinosaur in the basement
description: This strange skull may have come from a rare dinosaur â€” or from a Triceratops with an odd nose.

Readers can walk around this fossil - no longer on display - in their own space by using Augmented Reality. Or they can see interesting parts of the skull annotated on a 3-D model while they read about the history of this dinosaur.
